product_name: Marmot Southshore Flannel Shirt - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Soft and breathable, the Marmot Southshore flannel shirt warms girls up while making a campfire or just hanging out on a cool afternoon. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking polyester flannel fabric offers plenty of warmth without the weight. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Marmot Southshore flannel shirt has two button-down chest pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Soft and breathable, the Marmot Southshore flannel shirt warms girls up while making a campfire or just hanging out on a cool afternoon.
